channel.title: 🏢 UC Riverside on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 UC Riverside on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Your Diffusion Model is Secretly a Noise Classifier and Benefits from Contrastive Training
item.description: Diffusion models benefit from contrastive training, improving sample quality and speed by addressing poor denoiser estimation in out-of-distribution regions.
